member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiCall
member.summary: Base class for all API calls. No API call class should inherit directly from this class. Instead, inherit from .

member.name: M:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiCall`4.GetApiName
member.summary: Gets the name of the matching API call. Assumes it is the same as the class's name minus the lass four letters (i.e., "Call"). If the implementing class do not follow this convention, this method will need to be overridden.
member.returns: Name of the matching API call.

member.name: M:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiCall`4.Execute
member.summary: Performs the API call.
member.exception: The service endpoint URI was not defined in the context.
The name of the endpoint configuration section in the application configuration file was not set in the context.
The application did not set the access token in the context.
The API call did not have a response.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiCall`4.Request
member.summary: The request data object attached to this API call.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiCall`4.Response
member.summary: The response data object attached to this API call. Only valid after a call to .

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiCall`4.ApiVersion
member.summary: API version to request during the call. If not set, the default version () is used.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiCall`4.AccessExpirationDateUTC
member.summary: Date/Time the user's access token will expire. Only populate after calling the service if returned. The service will not return the expiration date unless the token is about to expire.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiContext
member.summary: Context for all API calls.

remarks.example:
Default configuration
<system.serviceModel> <bindings> <basicHttpBinding> <binding name="Service1Binding_IService1" closeTimeout="01:01:00" openTimeout="01:01:00" receiveTimeout="01:10:00" sendTimeout="01:01:00" allowCookies="false" bypassProxyOnLocal="false" hostNameComparisonMode="StrongWildcard" maxBufferSize="65536" maxBufferPoolSize="524288" maxReceivedMessageSize="65536" messageEncoding="Text" textEncoding="utf-8" transferMode="Buffered" useDefaultWebProxy="true"> <readerQuotas maxDepth="32" maxStringContentLength="8192" maxArrayLength="16384" maxBytesPerRead="4096" maxNameTableCharCount="16384" /> <security mode="None"> <transport clientCredentialType="None" proxyCredentialType="None" realm="" /> <message clientCredentialType="UserName" algorithmSuite="Default" /> </security> </binding> </basicHttpBinding> </bindings> <client> <endpoint address="" binding="basicHttpBinding" bindingConfiguration="Service1Binding_IService1" contract="Core.Soap.IService1" name="Service1Binding_IService1" /> </client> </system.serviceModel>

member.name: M:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiContext.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new API context instance.

member.name: M:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiContext.StartUserAuthorization(System.Uri,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Start the two-phase user authorization process by setting up callback information and redirecting to the provider's OAuth authenication endpoint.
member.param: URI where the provider will redirect on a successful authorization.
Any parameters the provider should return in the callback without modification.
member.remarks: Internally, this call causes the user's browser to redirect to the provider's OAuth page for authentication/authorization. Once the user authorized the consumer and redirects back to the callback URI, the application needs to call .

member.name: M:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiContext.FinishUserAuthorization
member.summary: Completes the two-phase user authorization by converting the token information returned by the provider to an actual access token to allow access to the provider's resources in the name of the user.
member.returns: true if a valid access token was returned.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiContext.TokenManager
member.summary: Token Manager for the API context.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiContext.ConsumerKey
member.summary: Gets and sets the OAuth consumer key defined by the provider. Must be set before any API calls.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiContext.ConsumerSecret
member.summary: Gets and sets the OAuth consumer secret defined by the provider. Must be set before any API calls.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiContext.AccessToken
member.summary: Gets and sets the OAuth access token for user that the application is impersonating.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiContext.AccessTokenSecret
member.summary: Gets the secret associated with the OAuth access token.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiContext.Environment
member.summary: Gets and sets the target API environment.
member.remarks: This must be set to before the endpoint can be changed. When set, the endpoints are automatically set to the default values for that environment.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiContext.OAuthEndpoint
member.summary: Gets and sets the endpoint URI for OAuth authorization.
member.remarks: This property's setter can only be called if is set to first.
member.exception: Thrown if set while is not set to .

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiContext.ServiceEndpoint
member.summary: Gets and sets the endpoint URI for API web service application.
member.remarks: This property's setter can only be called if is set to first.
member.exception: Thrown if set while is not set to .

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiContext.EndpointConfigurationName
member.summary: Gets and sets the name of the endpoint configuration in the application's configuration file. Must be set before any API call.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Exceptions.MissingConsumerSecretException
member.summary: Exception thrown when no consumer secret is found during an API call.

member.name: F:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.ApiEnvironment.Sandbox

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.BaseRequestType.MessageID
member.summary: User-supplied ID returned in the response's CorrelationID property. Maximum length is 50.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.BaseRequestType.OutputSelector
member.summary: Comma-separated list of response property names to return in the response. Names must be the full name where each level is separated with a period.
member.remarks: If the property is itself contains sub-properties, all these sub-properties are returned. If the property is a list, the name of the list property is to be used.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetInventoryItemsRequestType
member.summary: Request for the GetInventoryItems command.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetInventoryItemsRequestType.PageIndex
member.summary: 0-based page index. If not specified, defaults to 0. Must be 0 or greater.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetInventoryItemsRequestType.PageSize
member.summary: The maximum number of items to be returned per page. Defaults to 20. If specified, the value must be between 1 and 50.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetInventoryItemsRequestType.DetailGroups
member.summary: List of group names that determines the amount of detail in the item data returned in the response. Each item must be separated with a comma. If not specified, all item data properties are returned.
member.remarks:
Description of properties returned by detail group: NameProperties Returned
AllAll properties
Group1 NumFound, Items.ItemId, Items.Quantity, Items.IsStoreVisible, Items.CanPurchase
Group2 NumFound, Items.ItemId, Items.Name, Items.ShortDescription, Items.LongDescription
Group3 NumFound, Items.ItemId, Items.Categories, Items.Pricing, Items.Images, Items.Weight, Items.StoreUrl
Group4 NumFound, Items.ItemId, Items.SupplierId, Items.WarehouseId, Items.Sku, Items.Weight
Group5 NumFound, Items.ItemId, Items.Name, Items.Sku, Items.Pricing, Items.Quantity, Items.IsStoreVisible, Items.CanPurchase, Items.SupplierId, Items.WarehouseId

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetInventoryItemsRequestType.ItemIdList
member.summary: List of ItemId values to which to restrict the results. A maximum 50 of values are allowed.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetInventoryItemsRequestType.SupplierId
member.summary: ID of the supplier on which to filter the results.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetInventoryItemsRequestType.CategoryId
member.summary: ID of the category on which to filter the results.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetInventoryItemsRequestType.SearchTerm
member.summary: Search term on which to filter the results. Searches against an item's name, descriptions, and SKU values. Maximum length is 1000.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetInventoryCategoriesRequestType
member.summary: Request for the GetInventoryCategories command.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetInventoryCategoriesRequestType.PageIndex
member.summary: 0-based page index. If not specified, defaults to 0. Must be 0 or greater.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetInventoryCategoriesRequestType.PageSize
member.summary: The maximum number of items to be returned per page. Defaults to 20. If specified, the value must be between 1 and 50.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetInventoryCategoriesRequestType.RootCategoryId
member.summary: ID of the category to deem the root category for the request. All returned categories are sub-categories. If not specified, it's set to the inventory's root category.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetInventoryCategoriesRequestType.ParentCategoryId
member.summary: ID of the parent category of all categories to be returned. Returned categories are immediate children of this category.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetOrdersRequestType
member.summary: Request information for the GetOrders command.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetOrdersRequestType.PageIndex
member.summary: 0-based page index of items to be returned. Defaults to 0. If specified, must be 0 or greater.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetOrdersRequestType.PageSize
member.summary: Maximum number of items to be returned. Defaults to 20. If specified, must be between 1 and 20.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetOrdersRequestType.DetailGroups
member.summary: List of group names that determines the amount of detail in the item data returned in the response. Each item must be separated with a comma. If not specified, all item data properties are returned.
member.remarks:
Description of properties returned by detail group: NameProperties Returned
AllAll properties
Group1 NumFound, Orders.OrderId, Orders.DateCreated, Orders.Customer.FullName, Orders.ShippingMethod, Orders.Status, Orders.Total
Group2 NumFound, Orders.OrderId, Orders.BillingInfo, Orders.ShippingInfo
Group3 NumFound, Orders.OrderId, Orders.Suppliers
Group4 NumFound, Orders.OrderId, Orders.Discounts, Orders.SubTotal, Orders.ShippingCost, Orders.HandlingCost, Orders.Taxes, Orders.Total

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetOrdersRequestType.OrderIds
member.summary: List of at most 20 order IDs to be returned.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetOrdersRequestType.OrderStatusFilter
member.summary:
List of group names that determines the type of orders based on status to return in the response. Each name must be separated with a comma.
If not specified, all order types are returned.
member.remarks:
Description of orders returned by filter name:
AllAll orders.
UnderMerchantReview Return orders that are under merchant review.
PaymentPending Return orders that have payment pending on child orders.
UnderSupplierReview Return orders that are under supplier review.
MerchantUnconfirmed Return orders where the merchant part is unconfirmed.
MerchantUnshipped Return orders where the merchant part is unshipped.
MerchantShipped Return orders where the merchant part has shipped.
MerchantCancelled Return orders where the merchant part has been cancelled.
SupplierUnconfirmed Return orders where one of the supplier parts is unconfirmed.
SupplierUnshipped Return orders where one of the supplier parts is unshipped.
SupplierShipped Return orders where one of the supplier parts has shipped.
SupplierCancelled Return orders where one of the supplier parts has cancelled.
MerchantRefundPending Return orders where the merchant has open refund requests.
PaymentNotVerified Return orders where the status is 'Payment Not Verified' which indicates a problem that will/could be fixed when the gateway company send us an asynchronous notification.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.VerifyPlaceOrderRequestType
member.summary: Request for the VerifyPlaceOrder command.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.VerifyPlaceOrderRequestType.Cart
member.summary: Data needed to verify if an order can be placed. Required.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.PlaceOrderRequestType
member.summary: Request for the PlaceOrder command.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.PlaceOrderRequestType.Cart
member.summary: Data needed to place an order. Required.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.GetVersionsRequestType
member.summary: Request for the GetVersions command.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.ItemIdListType
member.summary: List of ItemId values.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderIdListType
member.summary: List of Order IDs.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderCartType
member.summary: Type containing data used to place a new order.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderCartType.Customer
member.summary: Order customer information. Not yet available. Must be null.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderCartType.BillingInfo
member.summary: Order billing information. Required when calling "PlaceOrder".

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderCartType.ShippingInfo
member.summary: Order shipping address information. Required.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderCartType.ShippingMethod
member.summary: Order shipping method. Required.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderCartType.Items
member.summary: Items to place into the order. Required.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderCustomerType
member.summary: Type containing information about an order's customer.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderCustomerType.FullName
member.summary: Full (first + last) name of the customer. Required when calling "PlaceOrder". Maximum length is 50.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderCustomerType.ContactPhoneNumber
member.summary: Contact phone number. Required when calling "PlaceOrder". Maximum length is 25.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderCustomerType.EmailAddress
member.summary: Email address. Required when calling "PlaceOrder". Maximum length is 50.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.BillingInfoType
member.summary: Type containing information about a user/customer's billing information.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.BillingInfoType.Address
member.summary: Billing address information. Needed when using a credit card. Required.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.AddressType
member.summary: Type containing name, address and phone information.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.AddressType.Title
member.summary: Person's title (Mr, Mrs, Ms, etc.). Maximum length is 5.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.AddressType.Name
member.summary: Person's name (first, middle, last, etc). Required. Maximum length is 50.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.AddressType.Street1
member.summary: First line of the street address. Required. Maximum length is 50.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.AddressType.Street2
member.summary: Second line of the street address. Maximum length is 50.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.AddressType.City
member.summary: Name of the city. Required. Maximum length is 50.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.AddressType.Region
member.summary: ISO 2-letter code of the region (state, province) if in the US or Canada. Otherwise, the full name of the region. Required. Maximum length is 50.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.AddressType.PostalCode
member.summary: Postal code. Required. Maximum length is 10.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.AddressType.Country
member.summary: ISO 2-letter country code. Required. Maximum length is 2.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderCartItemListType
member.summary: Type containing a list of items in an order to be placed in the system.

member.name: T:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderCartItemType
member.summary: Type containing information on a single item in an order cart.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderCartItemType.ItemId
member.summary: ID of the item in the caller's product inventory. Required.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.OrderCartItemType.Quantity
member.summary: How many of the item is being ordered. Required. Must be 1 or greater.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.BaseResponseType.Timestamp
member.summary: Date/Time response was created (in UTC).

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.BaseResponseType.Status
member.summary: Result code of the operation.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.BaseResponseType.Version
member.summary: Version used to process the request/response.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.BaseResponseType.Build
member.summary: Build used to process the request/response. This value is useful when contacting support.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.BaseResponseType.MessageID
member.summary: MessageID passed in the request.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.BaseResponseType.Errors
member.summary: List of warnings/errors produced by the operation.

member.name: P:Shopster.API.Service.SDK.Core.Soap.BaseResponseType.AccessExpirationDate
member.summary: Date/Time in UTC when the user's access to the API will expire. Only returned when it will expire within 7 days. The user must re-authorize before this date/time.

member.summary: Item name. Maximum length is 100.

member.summary: Item short description. Maximum length is 255.

member.summary: Item long description. Maximum length is 4000.

member.summary: ID of the item's supplier.

member.summary: ID of the item in the general warehouse.

member.summary: Item category hierarchy.
